Package uk.ac.manchester.cs.spinnaker.job

Class JobSpecification

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.manchester.cs.spinnaker.job.JobSpecification
public class JobSpecification
extends java.lang.Object
The specification for a job. Can be any type of job, though the rest of this implementation only really supports PyNN jobs running on SpiNNaker hardware using sPyNNaker.

  • Constructor Summary

    • JobSpecification

      public JobSpecification​(SpinnakerMachine machineParam, JobParameters parametersParam, int idParam, java.lang.String urlParam)
      Create the specification for running a job.
      Parameters:
      machineParam - The machine to run the job on.
      parametersParam - The parameters to the job.
      idParam - The ID of the job.
      urlParam - The URL
